text: iv. empowering communities to become more resilient and increase participation: proactively engaging with local people and businesses (with a particular focus on underserved communities and groups) to shape proposals, and investing in communities to become more resilient through initiatives that will improve safety, health, and wellbeing; and v. working towards a clean and green future: implementing policies and initiatives that support the councilâ€™s vision to become a carbon neutral borough, improving air quality and reducing waste (including promoting the circular economy).
